title: Interpretation of a yellow cat dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.text:
Seeing a yellow cat in a dream means committing mistakes and other interpretations. We will explain this for the unmarried woman, the married woman, the pregnant woman, and the divorced, such as a yellow cat attacking me, or a small yellow cat moving away from me, or a yellow cat chasing me, for Ibn Sirin, and others in the continuation of the topic.
The interpretation of a yellow cat in a dream
Seeing a yellow cat in a dream means that the dreamer will commit mistakes in his life that have never happened before and will argue with people around him and make them angry, and his reaction will make him make mistakes.
Seeing a yellow cat in a dream means that the dreamer will obey those who do evil and evil and have evil intentions, and they will go their way, and for this he will not care about himself or his money, and he will throw himself into ruin.
Seeing a small yellow cat in a dream means that the person who sees the vision will be approached by people who will tempt him with shameful acts and try to convince him to do so to make money and win easily, and if the expression is true, because of those who obey the devil, he will defile his hand with illegal gains.
Seeing a yellow cat with white in a dream has the meaning of meeting good and evil in a way similar to human instinct, which means that it expresses that the dreamer has good thoughts and bad thoughts like any human being, that is, you can do good deeds and be drawn to bad events.
The dream of the yellow cat symbolizes the spiritual peace and tranquility that the dreamer will experience after overcoming his problems and getting rid of bad friends, as he will be able to achieve anything he wants if he decides to do so.
Seeing yellow cats in a dream means that you are thinking about the decisions you need to make in order to achieve emotional stability and peace of mind.
To dream of yellow and cat
To have a yellow cat in your dream means that you need a break to recharge your energy and rejuvenate, and is a sign that you are in danger of being subjected to some force beyond your control.
Your dream also indicates carefree situations and a life where your desires are fulfilled happily if you can control yourself and not be negatively influenced by others.
It also indicates that you need to stop and rest to find solutions to some problems in ZOE.
Dreaming of a yellow cat symbolizes bad luck and draws attention to the fact that you need to get rid of negative people, habits, or emotions that drain your vitality and positive energy.
Dreaming of a yellow cat may indicate the need to control some feelings that may reduce your self-confidence and help you not to focus and lack of interest in life.
If you dream of a yellow cat attacking you, it means that there is a serious illness that will affect you soon, or you may be suffering from a rare disease that has no cure.
Seeing a large number of yellow cats in a dream indicates the abundance of envy and the abundance of haters, so the dreamer must be careful about the people around him.
Whoever sees a yellow cat in his dream, it means that he will commit some forbidden things, or earn some money from forbidden sources.
Playing with a yellow cat in a dream is evidence of a traitor who is plotting against you and you are unaware of it.
The interpretation of killing a yellow cat in a dream
Seeing a yellow cat being killed in a dream indicates the dreamer's success in getting rid of bad thoughts in his head, evil intentions that lead him astray, and getting rid of temporary empty desires, so he is purified from vices, and thanks to this, it will make him feel comfortable and relaxed and find confidence.
Whoever sees that he has a yellow cat in his dream and kills it, it means that the person will not give up the philosophy he adopts in life, which is to be content with some permissible things.
The interpretation of playing with a yellow cat in a dream
The person who sees himself playing with a yellow cat in a dream will engage in illegal methods that steal his mind and take him away from the right path, so he will be deceived by a person who loses his respect and is the cause of guilt before God. This person follows him and works with him in joint works, and walks in an unlawful way. halal way.
The interpretation of a large yellow cat in a dream
Seeing a large yellow cat in a dream indicates that the dreamer will enter into a risky business and will do everything to earn more than what he has.
The interpretation of a small yellow cat in a dream
Seeing a small yellow cat in a dream indicates an uncomfortable life and suffering from anxiety, and the vision also indicates the occurrence of sad events and the emergence of small problems that were not necessary only because of psychological pressure.
The interpretation of a yellow cat attacking me in a dream
Seeing a yellow cat attacking you in a dream means stress, many sins, suffering, and difficulty sleeping.
Anyone who sees a yellow cat attacking in a dream indicates a loss of livelihood due to the many forbidden acts.
Also, seeing a yellow cat attacking you in your dream is evidence of envy and hatred on the part of some people close to you.
The interpretation of a yellow cat in the house in a dream
Seeing a yellow cat in the house in a dream indicates the emergence of problems and crises within the family, as well as financial crises and debts.
In some cases, if you see a yellow cat in the room in a dream, it is a spell of magic.
The interpretation of the death of a yellow cat in a dream
Seeing a yellow cat die in a dream indicates the end of difficulties, finding solutions to problems, and the arrival of relief. Seeing a yellow cat die in a dream is a sign of imminent victory over the enemy and evidence of the fulfillment of desires and goals.
The interpretation of a yellow cat giving birth in a dream
Seeing a yellow cat give birth in a dream means that you must pay attention to all the actions and words you do and prove that there are many forbidden things that you commit and must repent from.
The interpretation of a yellow cat in a dream for a pregnant woman
Seeing a yellow cat in a pregnant woman's dream indicates that she will face health problems and show fear of childbirth.
The pregnant woman, if she sees a yellow cat in her dream, indicates that she is being envied.
Aborting a yellow cat in a pregnant woman's dream indicates ease of childbirth, health, and safety for her and the fetus, God willing.
The interpretation of a yellow cat in a dream for a married woman
Seeing a yellow cat in a married woman's dream indicates sins and shows that the woman has many bad qualities that she must get rid of.
A married woman who sees a yellow cat in a dream means that she suffers from low self-esteem and suffers from a difficult life due to life's pressures and because of the financial problems she faces.
Killing a yellow cat in a married woman's dream indicates a happy life and comfort.
A yellow cat bite in a dream indicates problems with the husband and indicates wrong behavior on the part of the wife.
Playing with a yellow cat in a dream means that there is someone who does not wish you well and harms you and your family members...

title: The interpretation of a dream about removing black spots according to Ibn Sirin

preview.text: Seeing blackheads removed in a dream indicates longevity and other interpretations. We will explain this for the single man, married, pregnant, and divorced, such as removing blackheads from the face, cleaning the nose from blackheads, cleaning the face from blackheads, or removing blackheads from the nose according to Ibn Sirin and others in the topic line below: The interpretation of removing blackheads in a dream. Seeing blackheads removed in a dream. It indicates longevity, strength, and resilience. However, this vision shows that you must live life simply, because stress and difficult situations will weaken the relationship. To dream that you are removing blackheads is evidence of a need to connect with someone and an indication that you need to be close to the people you love because they represent the beginning of the path you are following in a new life. Removing dark spots is a sign of celebration and evidence that you maintain your appearance in a dignified and attractive way in front of others.  Who knows. Cleaning the nose of blackheads in a dream. This means that you feel at ease, as your dream represents the idea and feeling that you are dependent on others, but in reality you are independent and a decision-maker in your life. Dreaming of removing blackheads is a sign of your secret resentment towards someone. It also indicates that you need to stop and think about your past mistakes or problems before moving forward. Removing black marks in a dream means that you may feel that your emotional life is being focused on or looked at by others. The dream indicates financial concerns and suggests that you think carefully about the situation before making a decision. Removing black marks in this dream is an indication that someone depends on you completely, or the vision is a sign that you may find yourself in a situation that forces you to take care of someone. You may be stressed about upcoming exams, tests, or a job interview. You may also be trying to hide your personal secrets from others, and the dream indicates that you are losing your strength in one area.  Cleaning the face of blackheads in a dream means that you need to deal with your emotions and problems before they cause more damage in the long run. Removing blackheads in a dream symbolizes many hidden aspects of your personality that others do not realize. This vision also indicates that you may be looking for some guidance to improve your actions. Anyone who sees blackheads removed in a dream means that your thinking is not kind. Instead, you have rigid and sometimes irrational thinking. This dream also shows a side of your personality that you ignore or abandon. For example, you may be a brilliant artist, but you do not take advantage of this talent. Cleaning blackheads in a dream means that the dreamer will face difficulties in expressing certain aspects of his feelings to his lover.  Dreaming of removing blackheads is sometimes a sign of unrealistic desires or expectations. You may be too domineering or overconfident, but you easily give up. This dream means a pattern of self-destructive behavior or unhealthy habits such as smoking. This vision may indicate that you feel sadness due to the death of someone important to you.  And the dream of removing blackheads, unfortunately, draws attention to your unrealized goals and indicates that you feel inadequate about your life. It proves that you are not performing the tasks required of you in the right way. You should try to make yourself a person based on your abilities.  Unfortunately, your dream is a warning and a sign of many obstacles and problems in your life, and it also indicates that you are forced to do something you do not really want to do. To dream that you are removing blackheads is evidence that you should be free from any restrictions, and the dream also indicates that you are missing someone or talking to someone. The vision shows that blackheads are removed from the body into the change that happens in your life, perhaps in your behavior or personality, or something new comes to you. Similarly, seeing blackheads removed indicates relief and the disappearance of their worries, and the vision promises you happiness. A strong will. Removing blackheads from the body also indicates getting rid of some of the problems you suffer from. But if you see that you are trying to remove blackheads from your nose in a dream, it means that you have some kind of admiration for someone.  The interpretation of blackheads in a dream. Blackheads in a dream indicate your needs and desires and a sign of your desire to escape the pressures of life. This dream also shows that you are willing to make sacrifices and show courage to defend your beliefs. Blackheads in a dream mean that you are trying to express yourself in a subtle or simple way and this is not enough. You need to be encouraged more than that. If you dream of blackheads on your nose, it means that you are trying to find clarity in a situation or that you are trying to find out the reason for the problem.  Dreaming of blackheads is a sign of regret for something you did. This dream tells you that you feel inadequate in what you are doing and that you need to make more effort.  The dream of blackheads is a message of sadness and depression. You may not be proud of something you have done recently. This dream represents the discovery or realization that there is a weakness in your plans or thinking.  The dream of blackheads is a warning of the contradiction you have. The dream tells you that you sometimes impose your opinions on others and other times you cannot express yourself or confess to others.  Blackheads in a dream mean that you must overcome your limitations and overcome obstacles in pursuit of your goals. It also indicates that you must recognize your problems in order to move forward. This dream is a warning about hesitation and how you cannot commit to something. The vision also tells you that you can achieve financial savings in your life in an exaggerated way. This is not correct. Instead, you should be balanced and not maximize your resources if you do not need to. Moreover, what is the point of accumulating a lot of capital when you cannot exploit it or invest it?  Collect the money you need only and enjoy your life and spend money on the things you need. Also, the dream of blackheads on the nose indicates freedom and openness and an indication of opportunities that will be available to you, but you may not be able to take advantage of those opportunities because you refuse to acknowledge a particular point of view or idea. Your dream is a sign of the great pride you feel and the many blessings that God gives you, but your selfishness and arrogance will lose you your friends. Large blackheads in a dream. This means that the truth of some things will soon be revealed to you.  YouTube interpretation of removing blackheads in a dream.

title: Dream interpretation of receiving a comb from a dead person in a dream

preview.html:
html

Dream interpretations about receiving a comb from the dead in a dream We may want to know the interpretation of the dream that I take the comb from the dead in a dream, one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants that. We learn an interpretation for it, to know its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some diligent scholars.

Dream interpretation of receiving a comb from a dead person in a dream

  • Receiving a comb from a dead person in a dream may indicate the fulfillment of desires and dreams.
  • If a person sees that he is taking a comb from a dead person, this may indicate a strong desire to achieve his ambitions during this period, and God knows best.
  • In the event that a person sees that he is taking a comb from a dead person, this may indicate that some changes will occur in the life of the dreamer during this period, and God knows best.

Dream interpretation of a comb falling in a dream

  • A comb falling in a dream may indicate the disappointment that the dreamer feels from some people.
  • If a person sees that he is holding a comb and it falls from him, this may indicate that he suffered severe pain in his life at that time.
  • Seeing a comb fall in a dream may indicate the loss of rights and judgments that the dreamer may be exposed to, and God knows best.
  • Seeing the comb fall in a dream may mean that he heard bad news during this period and needs to seek God's help

Dream interpretation of cleaning a hair comb in a dream

  • Cleaning a comb from hair in a dream may indicate a new opportunity that the dreamer may get during this period.
  • In the event that the dreamer personally cleans the comb, this may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer's life during that period by the grace of God.
  • If a person sees that he is combing his hair and cleaning the comb after it, this may indicate a great benefit that the dreamer may receive during this period by the grace of God.
  • And the dream of cleaning a comb from hair may indicate the removal of worries and pains that the dreamer has suffered for a period of time, and God knows best.

Dream interpretation of a comb without teeth in a dream

  • Seeing a comb without teeth in a dream may indicate a problem that the dreamer may face in his life, and God knows best.
  • In the event that the person sees that the comb is without teeth, this may indicate the impossibility of achieving desires and dreams, and he should seek God's help.
  • Whoever sees in a dream that the comb was without teeth may indicate some material obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life at that time.
  • If a person sees a comb without teeth in a dream, this may indicate the presence of some problems and disagreements that the dreamer cannot get rid of, and God knows best.

Dream interpretation of teeth falling from a comb in a dream

  • May indicate teeth falling from a comb in a dream to the loss of a person or his upcoming trip.
  • Seeing teeth from a comb falling in a dream may indicate the loss of dreams and aspirations for the dreamer, and he must seek God's help.
  • Seeing the teeth of a comb falling in a dream may indicate the presence of some problems and difficulties in the dreamer's life during this period.
  • If a person sees that the teeth of the comb are falling, this may indicate the distance of worries and problems in your life, the person who has the vision and needs to seek help from God.

Dream interpretation of someone giving me a comb in a dream

  • May indicate seeing someone giving the dreamer a comb to a valid testimony that the dreamer gives to that person.
  • If the dreamer sees someone giving him a comb, this may indicate that there is a person who is warning him of a problem or danger that he is exposed to.
  • In the event of seeing someone giving him a comb, this may indicate the knowledge and insight that the dreamer can gain from this person.
  • It is possible to see in a dream someone combing the dreamer indicates his strong attachment and great love for him during this time, and God knows best.

Dream interpretation of losing a comb in a dream

  • Losing a comb in a dream may indicate the presence of great competition in the dreamer's life at that time.
  • If a person sees that the comb is lost, this may indicate some material problems that the dreamer may face in his life during this period, and God knows best.
  • When you see the loss of a comb in a dream, this indicates the accumulation of debts or obstacles that the dreamer faces during those days.
  • If a person sees that the comb is lost, this may indicate a material loss or the loss of a family member during this period, and God knows best.

Dream interpretation of hair falling on a comb in a dream

  • Losing hair from a comb in a dream may indicate some problems and difficulties that the dreamer will face in his life during this period.
  • In the event that the person sees that the hair was falling from the comb, this may indicate the great effort that the dreamer has exerted at that time.
  • In the event that the person sees hair falling from the comb, this may indicate that he has repaid debts with great difficulty in those days by the grace of God.
  • And if a person sees his hair falling from the comb, this indicates some disagreements and problems in his life at that time, and God knows best.

Dream interpretation of lice in the comb in a dream

  • The presence of lice in the comb in a dream may indicate some problems that the dreamer will face in his life during those days.
  • Using a comb for lice in a dream may indicate that there are some solutions to the crises that the dreamer suffers from in his life, and God knows best.
  • If a person sees lice in his hair, this may indicate illegitimate money that the dreamer obtains and should repent to God Almighty.

Dream interpretation of buying a plastic comb in a dream

  • May indicate buying a plastic comb in a dream to the presence of loyal people in the dreamer's life during this time
  • Seeing and buying a plastic comb in a dream may indicate overcoming some difficulties and problems in the dreamer's life during this period.
  • Whoever dreams of buying a plastic comb , may indicate the arrival of good news at that time by the grace of God.
  • In the event that the person sees that he bought a plastic comb, this may indicate good changes occurring in the dreamer's life during this period, and God knows best.

Dream interpretation of giving a comb in a dream

  • Giving someone a comb in a dream may indicate that he is a good person who gives advice.
  • The dream of a person giving a comb to another person may indicate great knowledge and benefit that he provides to that person.
  • In the event of seeing someone giving a comb to another person, this may indicate advice that this person gives to the man.
  • The dream of giving a comb in a dream may indicate the huge source of livelihood that the person can obtain by the grace of God.

Dream interpretation of a dirty comb in a dream

  • A dirty comb in a dream may indicate the disappointment that the dreamer lives through during this period, and God knows best.
  • Seeing a comb dirty in a dream may indicate a great feeling of injustice during this…

title: Dream Interpretation of Black Clothes and Black Clothes in a Dream

preview.text: Seeing a black garment in a dream means sadness, separation, and other interpretations. We explain it for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, such as wearing a black garment, a black abaya, buying a black dress, and wearing a black blouse, according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and others.  Continuing the topic:  Interpretation of black clothes in a dream Seeing black clothes in a dream is a warning of evil for those who are not accustomed to wearing it, and for those who are accustomed to wearing it, it is a blessed vision and an indication of truth and repentance. It was said that he saw those black clothes in a dream, and it is a sign of death for the sick, because it is usually worn by the family of the deceased.  Because black clothes in a dream, the interpreters differed in this, some said: In it is an indication of sadness, disease, and distress all at once, and some said: The color of the death of the beloved and his separation, or the death of someone whose black clothes are washed. And others said that it is a calamity that will befall the household and they will tire because washing clothes is tiring for the woman and it contains the clothing of the whole household, and God is the owner of all will and knowledge.  Interpretation of black clothes in a dream according to Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin indicated that if a person wears black clothes in a dream, this is an indication of a major disaster that will cause him great sadness and depression in the case of the person not wanting to wear black except in the event that he prefers it.  Wearing black in a dream is evidence that the vision is good and an indication that something happy will come to the person.  Ibn Sirin explained that seeing black animals in a dream is evidence that the person will suffer great harm, as it could be deception or hatred.  Wearing black in a dream is one of the very disturbing dream interpretations that causes great fear and anxiety to all people, as black color in fact indicates the sadness that the person is going through in reality.  And in case you see someone black in a dream, it is an indication of instability that causes the person anxiety, as it makes him think that one of his relatives will die soon, which makes him flicker in the dream.  Interpretation of the black garment in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq  The man's vision to see one of the dead wearing black clothes, and this vision indicates the commission of sins and transgressions for whoever sees it, and it indicates that he is the one who committed sins and transgressions with great regret. As for the man who sees himself wearing black clothes, this vision indicates a promotion at work and also indicates a high position when the man truly loves the black color.  Seeing a married woman wearing black clothes, this vision indicates tension and tension, and it shows and indicates tension in the relationship between her and her husband, and this does not happen often, but to a very large extent.  Seeing a black dress in the dream of a married woman indicates positive changes in her life.  Also seeing black curtains in a dream, this vision is ominous, and sometimes it appears poverty, and sometimes it indicates great suffering in life in general.  Seeing the black color in the pregnant woman's clothes indicates the extent of her fear of childbirth.  A single girl dreams that she is wearing a black garment in a dream, and she is pleased with herself, or she sees someone who pleases her in a dream while she is wearing a black garment.  Seeing a girl wearing a black dress at a wedding or family gathering, this vision indicates excellence and success, and it indicates travel, and sometimes it shows marriage.  Interpretation of wearing black clothes in a dream  The jurists in the interpretation of dreams say that the black color in a dream is one of the unfavorable visions, the black color in the dream indicates illness and anxiety. Whoever sees himself wearing black clothes in an uneasy dream, this indicates that he is suffering from poverty and great sorrow.  Interpretation of wearing a black garment in a dream If a man sees in a dream that one of the dead is wearing black clothes, this means that this person has committed many sins and transgressions in his life. But if the dreamer sees himself wearing a black robe, this means that he will get a promotion and get an excellent position at work.  Interpretation of wearing black clothes in a single dream  Dream interpretation lawyers say that if a single girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a black dress at her engagement or wedding, this indicates that she will suffer anxiety and sadness over the subject of her engagement.  But if she sees that she is wearing a black dress and she is very beautiful and loved by everyone, this indicates that she is confident in herself and can impose herself on everyone.  But if the girl sees herself wearing a black suit and you are taking her to a meeting, this was an indication of success, excellence, and advancement in work.  If she sees that her room and the furniture in it are black, this indicates that she will travel and be far from her family.  Interpretation of black clothes in a dream for a married woman  Dream interpretation jurists say that if a married woman sees that her clothes have turned black, this means that she is suffering from pressure and tension in her life. This vision shows that the wife is suffering from problems and anxiety in her life.  But if she sees that she was wearing a black evening dress and it was conservative, this indicates that she will have many positive changes in her life.  If she sees that the curtains of the house and the bed covers have turned black, this indicates poverty and severe suffering from circumstances.  If she is pregnant and sees herself wearing black clothes, this indicates that she is worried about the delivery process, and black furniture indicates high prices.  Interpretation of wearing black in a dream for a single woman  Seeing a single girl wearing a black garment at one of the wedding celebrations in a dream is an indication that she will feel sadness, anxiety, and worry in the coming period.  Seeing a single woman wearing black in a dream, increasing her beauty and brilliance in the dream, is an indication that she is completely confident in herself to the fullest extent.  If the single woman sees black in a dream, it does not indicate her engagement or marriage, as it indicates that she will excel in her studies and obtain many academic degrees.  A single girl's dress black dress in a dream is an indication that she will travel to a distant city to earn money, and God will make her succeed in that city.  Interpretation of wearing black in a dream for a married woman  As for the married woman who sees all of her personal belongings black in a dream, this is an indication that fear and anxiety control her more than necessary.  If a married woman sees things in black in a dream, it means that she needs a lot of money to buy her basic needs.  Married in a black garment ...

title: I dreamed of eating in a strange place.

preview.html:
html

The interpretation of dreams about eating in a strange place in a dream, then we will present the interpretation of the dream of eating in a strange place in a dream and what messages it brings in reality and other details.

title: What is Ibn Sirin's interpretation of a dream about a child's shoe?

preview.text: The dream of children's shoes has many meanings and interpretations for the dreamer, and this vision usually indicates that the dreamer will get a lot of money or the emergence of many opportunities that will change the dreamer's life for the better. Today, through the Egyptian website, we will discuss the interpretations of this dream in detail for single women, pregnant women, married women, and divorced women. Ibn Sirin's interpretation of the dream of a child's shoe Seeing a child's shoe in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will achieve many profits and gains in the coming period. If you are suffering from financial hardship, the dream symbolizes a significant improvement in conditions. In the case of interpretation for a knowledge seeker, it symbolizes the achievement of scientific goals and reaching the highest positions. The dream also suggests that in the coming period, the dreamer will have many opportunities to change his life for the better, including new job opportunities. As for those who dream of wearing children's shoes, this symbolizes the need to stay away from bad friends, knowing that some of them, at this moment, are plotting to make the dreamer fall into misery. Wearing a child's shoe indicates the dreamer's need to keep up with the developments that are happening in life now because he is still living in the traditional way. Seeing a child's shoe indicates that the dreamer will be blessed by God Almighty with money and children, and will eventually achieve all the goals he aspires to. Interpretation of the dream of children's shoes for a single woman The dream of a small child's shoe for a single woman indicates that she is in dire need of protection and a sense of security and safety in her life, so she is looking for her life partner. The dream is a sign of marriage soon, knowing that she will find the ideal life partner who will help her improve her aspects. The dream of a child's shoe for a single woman also indicates her aspiration to have a better future, and she may travel in the coming period. The single girl who sees a small child's shoe in a dream is a sign that she will face many situations that will test her, is she a responsible person or not? Her childhood and do anything with high spontaneity. As for her who dreams of wearing children's shoes, it symbolizes the emergence of many changes in the dreamer's life, in addition to the fact that she will go through many experiences. Interpretation of the dream of wearing shoes for a young woman Seeing a little girl wearing shoes in a dream is a sign that she will live a wonderful life and a high level of luxury and comfort, knowing that she will get rid of all the negatives that have affected her life for a long time. However, if she is wearing cut children's shoes, this is evidence that she will complete many jobs that she stopped for a while. Interpretation of the dream of children's shoes for a married woman The dream of a small child's shoe for a married woman is a sign of her spiritual, moral, and physical connection with her husband. She cannot make any decision except with his advice, and she cannot imagine living this life without him. Seeing a child's shoe in a dream for a married woman is a sign that she pays a lot of attention and care to her husband and children. However, if she is suffering from problems with childbearing, this means that she will hear the news of her pregnancy in the coming period. If she is seen wearing silver children's shoes, this indicates her great love for her family, as it is one of her top priorities. However, if she has children of school age, this is evidence of good academic achievement. And knowledge, in addition to the fact that they will have a lot in the future. She will suffer from a health crisis. Interpretation of the dream of buying children's shoes for a married woman Buying children's shoes in a dream for a married woman is evidence that she will soon become pregnant, as God Almighty will give her good offspring. As for those who dream of buying children's shoes, it is a sign that she deserves all the responsibilities entrusted to her. It, as well as performing her marital duties to the best of her ability. If the shoes are bright white, it means that she will be pregnant with a girl. Interpretation of the dream of children's shoes for a pregnant woman The dream of a child's shoe for a pregnant woman indicates that the delivery date is approaching, knowing that the delivery will go smoothly without problems. However, if she sees that a child's shoe indicates that there are many people who look into her life, so it is necessary to keep her life secrets and not reveal them to anyone. . In the case of buying red shoes for a child, the dream shows that she will give birth to a girl of great beauty and morals, and everyone around her will love her. If the color of the shoes is black, this indicates that she will give birth to a male, and he will have a brilliant future and the best help and support for his family. If the pregnant woman sees that the child's shoes are very tight, this is evidence of a difficult childbirth. Interpretation of the dream of a divorced woman with children's shoes If the divorced woman sees children's shoes in her dream, this is a sign that she should get rid of despair, knowing that the future will be much better than the present and she will also be able to get rid of the problems. since the divorce occurred. Ibn Sirin also indicated that seeing a child's shoe for a divorced woman is a sign ...
